sumDscr.universe: Name of country: Netherlands Age limits: 16 years and older Location: national

dataColl.sampProc: Multi-stage sample: first stage was drawn from postal code register;: second stage: drawing of gross sample of 300.000 addresses of residences;: third stage: drawing of the final sample for this survey. Very detailed information about sampling procedures is available in the publication of L. Grosze Nipper: "Onderzoeksverantwoording Culturele Veranderingen in Nederland 1997", Amsterdam, NIPO, 1998. Number of unit original/losses: 2267
dataColl.collSitu: Duration of interview Presence of other people Other 1: respondent influenced by others Other 2: r.'s opinion about several aspects of the interview
dataColl.actMin: Letters: introduction letter Other: Dfl. 15,00 for respondent
